amendment.description: Amendment is the reported version of the resolution, House Report 119-17 as reported by the Committee on House Administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Steil amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Steil.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Steil amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
